DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective study enrolling consecutive patients who undergo transurethral resection of the bladder tumour (TURBT) aimed at determination of a safety of the procedure. Study end-points are incidence, severity and predictive factors of surgical complications. The study secondary aim is a validation of Clavien Dindo scoring system for reporting complication of TURBT.
DOC.brief_title: Complications of Transurethral Resection of the Bladder Tumour
DOC.criteria: primary or recurrent bladder tumour informed consent to undergo the surgery age <18 years
